otherNames: Great Xia Sword Master, Sword Master of the Great Xia, 大夏剑主
synopsis: Once dismissed as the shame of the capital, Lu Wuwei has risen from disgrace to stand at the pinnacle of power. Seven years ago, he was framed by enemies, stripped of his cultivation, and exiled alongside his father, turning his name into a symbol of failure. But hardship fuels his transformation. Now, armed with the legendary Great Snow Dragon Riders, Lu Wuwei returns not as the shamed heir but as a formidable force of vengeance and strength. These elite warriors, known throughout history as gods of war, accompany him as he reclaims his family’s honor.Lu Wuwei’s journey is one of redemption, revenge, and indomitable will. With every battle, he shatters the chains of his past and leaves a trail of defeated enemies. His rise from mediocrity to invincibility shocks the world, proving that true power lies not in birthright but in perseverance. As he reclaims his legacy, Lu Wuwei will stop at nothing to establish his reign and immortalize the name of the Great Snow Dragon Riders in history once again.Lu Wuwei, once disgraced, rises to power with the legendary Great Snow Dragon Riders to reclaim his family’s honor in a journey of revenge and redemption.
